item.title: Congresswoman-in-limbo Adelita Grijalva on the dilemma she faces
item.description: Democratic Rep. Grijalva won her special election more than two weeks ago, but House Republicans refuse to swear her into office.

item.title: Katie Porter’s bid for governor is getting noticed – but not how she wants
item.description: Two viral videos have brought unwelcome attention to the former congresswoman, who has been leading polls in the 2026 California governor’s race.
